metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9541 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
Qt through 5.14 allows an exponential XML entity expansion attack via a crafted SVG document that is mishandled in QXmlStreamReader, a related issue to CVE-2003-1564.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-9541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqt5concurrent5 - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5core5a - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5dbus5 - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5gui5 - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5network5 - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5opengl5 - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5printsupport5 - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5sql5 - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5sql5-ibase - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5sql5-mysql - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5sql5-odbc - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5sql5-psql - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5sql5-sqlite - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5sql5-tds - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5test5 - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5widgets5 - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
libqt5xml5 - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
qt5-flatpak-platformtheme - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
qt5-gtk-platformtheme - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
qt5-qmake - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
qt5-qmake-bin - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
qt5-xdgdesktopportal-platformtheme - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
qtbase5-examples - 5.12.5+dfsg-9build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pyside2 package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.12.5+dfsg-9build1').
